Articles.Content: Trying to build my first SSTO space plane and I am having an issue.  While trying to build speed in the atmosphere, my engines just slowly or even quickly slow down then shut off.  The only thing I can see dropping is my fuel flow.  Any idea on what is happening?

At what altitude is this happening? Are you saying it's something other than just the air getting thinner? 

Also, moved to Gameplay questions.

Every alttitude.....it just happened to me on the runway itself .  Currently flying at 9600 and my engines are at half speed and I didnt set them there.

Edited January 2, 2016 by Crash Zero
Pictures always help. It could be anything from not enough air intakes to the flight profile. Also, are yo using any add-ons?

1 hour ago, Crash Zero said:

Every alttitude.....it just happened to me on the runway itself .  Currently flying at 9600 and my engines are at half speed and I didnt set them there.

Does your plane by chance have a cargo bay?  If so, this migth be the same problem as reported in this thread
